channel.title: Game Rant
channel.description: Game Rant delivers content written by gamers for gamers with an emphasis on news, reviews, unique features, and interviews.

item.title: How to Get Every Smart Weapon in Cyberpunk 2077
item.dc:creator: Jeff Drake
item.description: Smart Weapons are among the best items in CD Projekt Red's Cyberpunk 2077, but they are not all born equal. Which gun is the best?
item.content:encoded: Nearly all open-world games have an array of weapons for the player to choose from. Most of these are some form of conventional weapon – a firearm of some kind. Cyberpunk 2077, on the other hand, has a selection of smart weapons the player can use. So what are smart weapons? In Cyberpunk 2077, smart weapons are capable of being directly interfaced by the player via a Smart Link from a Ripperdock.

item.title: Pokemon Fan Art Combining Parasect and Serperior is Like Something Out of The Last of Us
item.dc:creator: Bruna Telles
item.description: A Pokemon fan art combines Parasect and Serperior, and the result impresses while giving other fans of the franchise nightmares.
item.content:encoded: A Pokemon fan artist has made an impressive combination of Parasect and Serperior. Pokemon is a franchise known for its extremes, with Pokemon that have stories that are as adorable as they are disturbing.

item.title: Lords of the Fallen: How to Get Angel of The Void Armor Set
item.dc:creator: Artur Novichenko
item.description: The Angel of The Void Armor Set will boost defense and offer resistances in Lords of the Fallen. Here's how players can get their hands on it.
item.content:encoded: In Lords of the Fallen, the Angel of Void Armor Set will be essential. It's the perfect attire for players who need some extra Frostbite and Poison effects resists and Physical and Wither damage reduction. However, it might be tricky to find this set.

item.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey Isn’t The Only Horror Movie Based On A Children's Story
item.dc:creator: Carola Dager
item.description: Winnie-the-Pooh is not the only beloved character who has gone on a murder spree, many more classic stories have been reimagined as dark horror films.
item.content:encoded: At the beginning of 2022, the beloved character Winnie-the-Pooh, and all his friends in the Hundred Acre Wood, entered the public domain. Only 5 months after, a low-budget slasher film featuring the lovable bear turned into a homicidal maniac was announced, and less than a year later, Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey was released. The film’s first announcement went viral and caused a wave of mixed reactions, Internet memes, and social media talk. However, this is far from the first time a famous children’s book has been turned into a horror movie. Many classic characters have met the same fate as Pooh and Piglet, and their horrifying reimagined stories are a must-watch for all fans of the genre, or anyone looking to reinterpret (or ruin) their beloved childhood favorites.

item.title: Best Laptops for Gaming and Work in 2023
item.dc:creator: Jasper Schmich Kinney
item.description: Discover the ideal laptops that excel in gaming and productivity, ensuring you get the best of both worlds in one device.
item.content:encoded: Finding the right laptop that serves both gaming and work purposes can be as challenging as choosing a character class in an MMORPG. For enthusiasts and professionals alike, this guide dives into the world of dual-duty laptops that excel both in the heat of battle and the boardroom.

item.title: The Witcher 3: The Best Silver Swords, Ranked
item.dc:creator: Ben Baker
item.description: While steel swords will carve through human enemies silver swords will cut down any fearsome creature of legend.
item.content:encoded: Of all the weapons players use in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt perhaps most useful are the silver swords. These weapons are intended for the slaying of mythical, mystical, and magical beasts. While steel swords will carve through human enemies, silver swords will cut down any fearsome creature of legend.

item.title: Boruto: The Shinju Clones, Explained
item.dc:creator: Rei Penber
item.description: Boruto Two Blue Votex introduces some new villains - including a clone of Sasuke Uchiha.
item.content:encoded: Boruto: Two Blue Vortex is continuing with great intensity and it is safe to say that this month's chapter was certainly One of the most important ones in the story so far. Although there was no major fighting in this month's chapter, a lot of big secrets pertaining to the world of Boruto were finally explained and managed to utterly shock the fans, in both good ways and bad.

item.title: Best Greataxes In Elden Ring
item.dc:creator: Joe Grantham
item.description: Players shouldn't hesitate to get their hands on these impressive greataxes in Elden Ring.
item.content:encoded: Greataxes are two-handed weapons in Elden Ring that typically require a high Strength stat to be wielded. They are capable of dealing incredible damage, although this is at the cost of attack speed, meaning players will be vulnerable when swinging.

item.title: Best Racing Games On PS Plus Extra & Premium
item.dc:creator: Mark Sammut
item.description: Whether searching for an arcade title or a realistic sim, PlayStation Plus has racing fans covered.
item.content:encoded: Sony's PlayStation Plus Extra and Premium try to cover most genres, and racing games are naturally not an exception. Compared to some other categories like RPGs, racers are not as plentiful nor are new games added as frequently; however, the service still has a respectable selection of projects that cover a few different styles. There are both arcade and sim racers, along with a few niche titles that focus on other aspects of driving.

item.title: Remnant 2: How to Unlock Adventure Mode
item.dc:creator: Zunair Shafique
item.description: Discover how to easily unlock adventure mode in Remnant 2 and reroll worlds using this comprehensive guide.
item.content:encoded: With a substantial amount of core game content and plenty of different worlds and archetypes to unlock, Remnant 2 can easily keep gamers busy for hundreds of hours. Its procedurally generated nature provides amazing replayability, where the storyline, enemies, and bosses are all randomly generated.

item.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds - Can Captain Pike Avoid His Fate?
item.dc:creator: Brad Hill
item.description: Star Trek's Captain Pike glimpsed a grim fate for himself and isn't sure how to avoid it.
item.content:encoded: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds and the character of Captain Pike have given fans of Star Trek newfound hope in the franchise. The show takes the series back to its glory days, where each episode explored a new planet, culture, or issue. While the long-running serialized stories of Picard and Discovery are great storytelling, Strange New Worlds feels like a familiar pace for Star Trek. Anson Mount's Captain Christopher Pike is also a breath of fresh air, delivering a new kind of captain to the fans.

item.title: Best Healing Spells In Dungeons & Dragons 5e
item.dc:creator: Rhenn Taguiam
item.description: For players looking to build dynamic, flexible D&D characters, healers are a great choice. Here are some of the best spells for them to learn.
item.content:encoded: Players and Dungeon Masters (DMs) of Dungeons & Dragons know there's more to Wizards of the Coast's hit IP than just casting fireballs and hacking through monsters. Skilled players know the healer serves just as important a role as their tank and damage-dealing counterparts.

item.title: Disturbing Baldur's Gate 3 Bug Makes Characters Look Horrifying
item.dc:creator: Daniel Morris
item.description: A gamer online shows off a cursed bug in Baldur's Gate 3 that makes a few of the game's important characters look truly horrifying.
item.content:encoded: A Baldur's Gate 3 player has shown off an extremely cursed bug in the game, that appears to make characters look horrifying. Baldur's Gate 3 is one of the most popular games of the year, and even a frontrunner nominee at The Game Awards 2023. However, glitches like this show the game isn't quite perfect.

item.title: The Best Smart TVs in 2023
item.dc:creator: Michael Akuchie
Megan Miri Reyes
item.description: Smart TVs are here to stay and that's great news! We gathered our top smart TVs for 2023 so you can know which one is best for your space.
item.content:encoded: Over recent years, homes have become dominated by smart devices including speakers, lights, and cameras. The TV remains the central entertainment hub in many households, so it's only natural that they adopt features like voice control as well as support for major streaming video services. Whether a buyer considers a TV an appliance or a sophisticated piece of consumer electronics, it's one of the most impactful purchases for a single gamer or an entire family.

item.title: The Best Budget Gaming Laptops for 2023
item.dc:creator: Michael Akuchie
Matt Marandola
Jessica Kamphouse
Rahim Amir
item.description: Just because you're on a budget doesn't mean there aren't any gaming laptops for you. Find out who makes the best budget gaming laptop for you.
item.content:encoded: When buying a gaming laptop for the first time, its price is one of the most significant deciding factors with close attention paid to value for money. If on a budget, buyers may need to make tradeoffs. This includes having to shave off storage space for a better GPU or trading up from a high refresh rate screen to one with more visual fidelity. A budget gaming laptop can cost anywhere from $600 to $2000, depending on both one's classification of what a budget gaming laptop represents and its expected capabilities.

item.title: Games With Playable Knights
item.dc:creator: Waseem Muhammad
item.description: Players who ever fantasized about being a knight on an important quest may want to check out the following games.
item.content:encoded: Knights have always had huge attention when they are playable as a class in a multiplayer sword fighting game or a playable character in a linear storyline. They are represented as honorable soldiers who are ready to die on the battlefield fighting for their side. Recent video games have started to show different sides of Knights and changed how the players have been looking at them.

item.title: Payday 3's Content Update 1 is a Controversy Waiting to Happen
item.dc:creator: Anthony Bussing
item.description: Payday 3 finally announced the game’s first free content update, but given the state of the game, it may not be what the community was waiting for.
item.content:encoded: Payday 3 got off to a relatively poor start, but not all hope is lost for the sequel to the beloved heist-simulator franchise. Many fans are eager to see where the studio takes the game in future updates, which makes the recent announcement of Payday 3’s first free content update a sweet treat.

item.title: Borderlands Developer Could Be Making an Open World Game
item.dc:creator: Charming Holiday
item.description: A recent job listing by Gearbox Entertainment suggests that the Borderlands developer may be working on a new open world game.
item.content:encoded: Borderlands parent company Gearbox Entertainment is currently hiring a variety of game design roles, including one position that specifically requests experience with open worlds. In spite of recent rumors that developer Gearbox Software may be getting sold off, the studio is actively working on a number of games, with this particular job listing suggesting that a potential open world game may be in the works.

item.title: Naruto X Boruto Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections: How To Get Ryo
item.dc:creator: Suzail Ahmad
item.description: Ryo is the main currency in Naruto X Boruto Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections. Here is how players earn it quickly.
item.content:encoded: Naruto X Boruto Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections offers players the opportunity to experiment with a plethora of different characters. They can use a young Naruto or go for Baryon Mode Naruto, who can obliterate enemies. The choices are truly endless. To make things even more exciting, players can customize their character with trinkets and other items.

item.title: Super Mario RPG's Mallow Gets the Short End of the Stick
item.dc:creator: Zackari Greif
item.description: Between Mallow and Geno, there's no contest on who's the most popular, but Super Mario RPG's little Frog Sage apprentice deserves much more.
item.content:encoded: This article contains spoilers for Super Mario RPG.Nintendo has finally rereleased Super Mario RPG onto the Switch as a remake that remains faithful to the source material. After a long 27 years of waiting, loyal fans can once again traverse the Mushroom Kingdom from Bowser's Keep and back again while collecting the seven Star Pieces. As the remake keeps everything that made Super Mario RPG so memorable, while also upgrading a few aspects, it serves as a great way to travel with Mario's party in a whole new way.

item.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Zombies' Latest Update Has Ruined Its Most Exciting Feature
item.dc:creator: Richard Warren
item.description: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Zombies may have had a valid reason behind its latest update, but the nerf has ruined a key part of the experience.
item.content:encoded: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Zombies has been a bit of an unexpected success for Treyarch. When it was first announced, much of the Zombies fan base pushed back against the idea of an open-world experience, especially after Vanguard 's objective gameplay disappointed. However, though there are issues such as a reused Warzone map instead of an original location, most players seem to be having a good time with the mode. Replayable, unique, and ambitious, there is plenty to praise about Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 Zombies, but unfortunately, exfils are no longer a strength.

item.title: Harry Potter: What Happened to Aunt Marge?
item.dc:creator: Freya Keeping
item.description: Harry turning Aunt Marge into a balloon is undeniably iconic, but did Aunt Marge ever manage to return home?
item.content:encoded: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban introduced audiences to Aunt Marge, Uncle Vernon’s detestable sister. However, Aunt Marge’s visit to Privet Drive didn’t exactly go according to plan. The character makes no attempt to disguise her hatred for Harry, even telling Uncle Vernon: “He’d had been straight into an orphanage if he’d been dumped on my doorstep, Vernon”. The situation continues to escalate when Aunt Marge starts to badmouth Harry’s parents, referring to the late James Potter as a “drunk”. In a memorable scene, Aunt Marge blames Harry’s ‘troubled’ personality on Lily Potter, declaring: “If there’s something wrong with the bitch, then there’ll be something wrong with the pup”. Understandably, Harry promptly loses his temper, but it’s safe to say that Aunt Marge received her just deserts, making for one of the most iconic moments in the entire Harry Potter franchise.

item.title: Football Manager 2024: Best Teams, Ranked
item.dc:creator: Alex Alcock
item.description: With the multitude of teams available in Football Manager 2024, it's hard to know which ones are the best to pick.
item.content:encoded: There are simply too many football clubs in Football Manager 2024 for players to scrutinize every single one. Almost every professional football team is included in the game, from the mainstream to the forgotten. As a result, players have a wealth of options to choose from when beginning their campaign.

item.title: How Fallout 76's Wasteland Theatre Company Merges The Brotherhood of Steel With Shakespeare Coriolanus
item.dc:creator: Katelyn Kivel
item.description: Game Rant speaks with Fallout 76's Wasteland Theatre Company about the upcoming performance of Shakespare’s Coriolanus, framed in the game world.
item.content:encoded: Before a stage production, there’s always an air of anxiety. There’s no second takes in a live performance, so there’s a lot of pressure on performers to give their all from the moment the curtain rises to when it falls. That’s true whether the play is performed on Broadway, at a community theater, or in the case of a particular production of Shakespare’s Coriolanus, in Fallout 76.

item.title: Overwatch 2 Shouldn't Miss The Chance to Reference This Beloved Indie Title With Venture
item.dc:creator: Richard Warren
item.description: Overwatch 2 is set to introduce a Damage hero with a mining aesthetic in Season 10, and the character should come with references to a popular indie.
item.content:encoded: Overwatch 2 is no stranger to referencing other forms of media. Various Overwatch 2 sprays reference major moments in pop culture, while heroes offer unofficial nods to other forms of media within their various skin lineups, like Moira having David Bowie-inspired outfits. Maps feature Easter eggs, too, like Eichenwalde’s Dark Souls Bonfire and the entirety of Blizzard World, while voice lines for the heroes reference everything from Game of Thrones to Star Wars. With official collaborations like One Punch Man joining the list, it would not be surprising if Blizzard included a few tributes to Deep Rock Galactic in its hero shooter.

item.title: Best PSP Games
item.dc:creator: Daniel Kurland
item.description: The Sony PSP may not have been as widely successful as other handhelds but it had its fair share of great games.
item.content:encoded: Nintendo has been steadily dominating the handheld video game market, but that doesn't mean that Sony and Sega both didn't make a go in the field. Sony's PSP may not have been as popular as its follow-up, the Vita, which also struggled. However, the PSP still had a devout audience and it did some impressive things for a handheld.

item.title: Boruto: Kishimoto Reveals Sasuke's Shocking Fate
item.dc:creator: Rei Penber
item.description: Sasuke turns into a tree in Boruto Part 2.
item.content:encoded: Sasuke Uchiha is one of the main characters in the Naruto series and certainly one of the most powerful Shinobi to have ever lived. Fans have come to love and admire this character for years now, and the fact that he was one of the most important characters in Boruto became one of the biggest reasons why fans watched the series in the first place.

item.title: One Piece: Boa Hancock's Best Friends, Ranked
item.dc:creator: Rei Penber
item.description: These One Piece characters are the closest to the Pirate Empress, Boa Hancock.
item.content:encoded: Boa Hancock is one of the best-written female characters in One Piece. Famed as the Pirate Empress, Boa Hancock is the captain of the Kuja Pirates and hails from the special Kuja tribe. Her strength is such that she has received a bounty of 1.659 billion berries without even being a notorious pirate over the course of the last decade or so.

item.title: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet’s Unfinished Rainbow Pattern Could Point to a Third DLC
item.dc:creator: Andrea Trama
item.description: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet are gradually exposing players to different rainbow colors, and combined with the 19th type, it could point to another DLC.
item.content:encoded: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet were first released a year ago, and while their initial reception was mixed due to several issues that are somewhat still present, the impact that Gen 9 will leave on the franchise is likely going to be massive. This is because Gen 9 games dared to defy some rules and traditions that had never been broken before, and this is a good thing for the series moving forward, especially after the success of Pokemon Legends: Arceus' different formula. However, there is a strange pattern going on between Pokemon Scarlet and Violet and their first and second expansions, and the missing element (or elements) could be a great way to tease more content to come for Gen 9 - be it a sequel or third DLC.

item.title: Woodworker Shows Off Incredible Eevee Carvings
item.dc:creator: James Ratcliff
item.description: A Pokemon fan puts their carpentry talents to good use, as they create some incredible Eevee carvings and share pictures of the crafting process.
item.content:encoded: A Pokemon fan took up their woodcarving tools and created a pair of cute Eevee figures using some different types of wood. The Pokemon carpenter posted pictures of the creative process on social media and provided curious Pokemon trainers with a brief explanation of what techniques they used for the Eevee statues.

item.title: This Diablo 4 Druid Looks Like a Warhammer Character
item.dc:creator: Christian Miller
item.description: A Druid in Diablo 4 gets ready to purge some demons and root out heretical cultists by dressing up as a character inspired by Warhammer 40K.
item.content:encoded: Compared to past entries, character customization in Diablo 4 took a major leap forward, as one player showcased their Druid that looked like he came right out of the Warhammer 40K franchise. The campfire in Diablo 4 consists of five classes: Barbarian, Sorcerer, Druid, Rogue, and Necromancer. Allegedly, the sixth class that will be joining these iconic archetypes of Sanctuary is the Spiritborn, a nature-based class that will make its franchise debut in Vessel of Hatred, Diablo 4's first expansion.

item.title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Players Find Heartwarming Developer Tribute
item.dc:creator: Daniel Morris
item.description: A gamer online discovers a heartwarming tribute in Marvel's Spider-Man 2, dedicated to one of Insomiac Games' former developers.
item.content:encoded: A Marvel's Spider-Man 2 player has shared a heartwarming tribute to one of the game's developers, hidden in the game's rendition of Central Park. New York as seen in Marvel's Spider-Man 2 has plenty of secrets to discover, and Insomniac Games has ensured this individual has their very own slice of the city waiting to be found.

item.title: Destiny 2 Player Count Seems to Be Down This Season
item.dc:creator: Raul Landaverde
item.description: Destiny 2 player count appears to be on a downward trend in Season of the Witch as frustrations within the community continue to mount.
item.content:encoded: The Destiny 2 player count appears to be at its lowest point ever during Season of the Witch, as the popular live service title faces competition from several critically acclaimed games released throughout the year. Overall player sentiment has also been affected by Bungie's recent layoffs, which saw a considerable portion of the Destiny 2 community team being let go.

item.title: Captain America 4: Has Marvel Lost Faith In Its Brave New World?
item.dc:creator: Cameron Miller
item.description: Captain America 4 has been met with even more bad news, leaving some wondering whether or not Marvel is starting to sour on the new era.
item.content:encoded: While fans eagerly await the latest installment into the Captain America franchise, Captain America 4: Brave New World, things don’t seem to be going so great behind the scenes. In truth, it seems like the MCU as a whole is really struggling to fire up fans and get them to come out to theatres. As demonstrated by The Marvels, moviegoers aren’t willing to go out to see any average MCU movie that comes out anymore. Quality is key, and that couldn’t be more true for Anthony Mackie’s Sam Wilson in his first big-screen adventure as the character.

item.title: The Best Cheap Smart Home Gadgets in 2023
item.dc:creator: Adam Corsetti
Rahim Amir
item.description: Designing a smart home on a budget? Here are the best budget smart home gadgets you need to buy.
item.content:encoded: Smart home products have become much more affordable over time thanks to increased competition and more efficiently designed devices. As a result, one can begin their smart home journey with as little as a simple speaker or display that can control other smart gadgets in a home. Unfortunately, there is a seemingly endless number of options to choose from, and it's difficult to even decide on which smart home ecosystem to support.

item.title: Age Of Mythology: Best Gods, Ranked
item.dc:creator: Harold Purbrick
item.description: Age of Mythology offers a diverse selection of gods for players to choose from, with varying playstyles. These are the best ones in the game.
item.content:encoded: Age of Mythology is a true gem of the RTS genre, mixing classic Age of Empires RTS gameplay with fantasy-style mythology to create a thoroughly enjoyable strategy game. Importantly, Age of Mythology has an impressive set of gods to choose from, with the Extended Edition and DLC totaling 15 gods representing 5 different civilizations.

item.title: Avatar The Last Airbender: Psychic Bending, Explained
item.dc:creator: Adin Keshet (they/them)
item.description: Psychic bending in Avatar: The Last Airbender is definitely a bending art form that should be explored more but only as true psychic bending.
item.content:encoded: Psychic bending in Avatar: The Last Airbender is a rare, advanced bending art form that can theoretically be applied to any element. The franchise has so far only illustrated psychic bending through firebending, in the form of combustionbending, as well as bloodbending. However, one of these psychic bending art forms is not truly psychic.

item.title: Games With Playable Dinosaurs
item.dc:creator: Alexandra O'Leary
item.description: Fans who love controlling their favorite dinos from history may want to check out the following games.
item.content:encoded: Dinosaurs are by far one of the coolest and most interesting species humanity has had the pleasure of uncovering. For dozens of years, the behaviors and abilities of these creatures have captivated humanity on the big screen - and now in gaming. Although the realm of dinosaurs in video games still leaves a lot to be explored, there's still a great selection of titles that delve into the Mesozoic Era.

item.title: World of Warcraft Adding New Restriction to WoW Token Purchases
item.dc:creator: Eric Law
item.description: World of Warcraft adds a new restriction to WoW Token purchases with the intention of combating rising prices, gold farmers, and botting.
item.content:encoded: World of Warcraft players that haven’t bought game time using real money since 2017 will soon be unable to buy subscription time with WoW Tokens. This restriction is being added as a part of the fight against gold farmers and botting in World of Warcraft.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3 Player Kills and Keeps the Corpses of the Emerald Grove's Tieflings
item.dc:creator: Daniel Morris
item.description: A Baldur's Gate 3 player shares their collection of tiefling corpses, collected throughout their adventures in Emerald Grove.
item.content:encoded: A Baldur's Gate 3 player has shown off their strange collection, after killing all of the tieflings in Emerald Grove and taking their corpses along for the rest of the game. Choosing between siding with the goblin camp and the Emerald Grove tieflings is one of the hardest decisions in Baldur's Gate 3, but it's no secret what side this particular player is on.

item.title: Rumor: Borderlands 4 and Tiny Tina's Wonderlands 2 Potentially Leaked
item.dc:creator: Richard Warren
item.description: If a recent rumor is to be believed, fans of Gearbox’s popular looter-shooter franchise Borderlands could have two new games to look forward to.
item.content:encoded: The Borderlands franchise has expanded significantly in recent years, and if a rumor suggesting that two more games are in the works ends up being legitimate, then the series will only grow larger in the near future. Supposedly, both Borderlands 4 and Tiny Tina’s Wonderlands 2 are currently in the works.

item.title: Don't Sleep on This Best Deal of the Year on Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II
item.dc:creator: Matti Robinson
item.description: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II are now on sale for just $199 during the Black Friday sale on Amazon, which is by far the best price of the year.
item.content:encoded: Thanks to Amazon's Prime Day deals, which have started early, the Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II are now at a significant discount. These high-end earbuds are now priced at just $199, which is a massive 29% drop from the standard price of $279. This deal saves buyers $80 compared to the usual cost, which also makes this the single best deal on Amazon on this product ever. For those looking for earbuds, this deal is by far one of the best ones yet.

item.title: Everything You Need To Know About PS Plus
item.dc:creator: Mark Sammut
item.description: Sony's revamped PS Plus is an enticing service that offers a lot of value. Here is everything someone needs to know about the subscription.
item.content:encoded: Sony's PlayStation Plus has been around for more than a decade, however, the service received a full makeover in June 2022. Prior to this change, PS Plus granted subscribers access to online multiplayer, free monthly games, and a few other benefits like unique discounts on the PS Store. During this period, players could also subscribe to PlayStation Now to gain access to a library of PS4, PS3, and some PS2 games.

item.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Chapter 243: What To Expect
item.dc:creator: Rei Penber
item.description: Jujutsu Kaisen 243 will perhaps mark the end of Kenjaku's fight against Takaba.
item.content:encoded: Jujutsu Kaisen chapter 243 has the attention of every single fan of the series, after the previous chapter turned out to be quite an absurd one in many ways. Currently, the manga is throwing a lot of focus on the fight between Kenjaku and Takaba. These two characters have been fighting for around four chapters now and it doesn't seem like this fight is going to stop anytime soon.

item.title: Roblox The Presentation Experience Codes
item.dc:creator: Artur Novichenko
item.description: Roblox fans can take a look at this article to find all the latest codes for The Presentation Experience.
item.content:encoded: In Roblox: The Presentation Experience, players will find themselves in a school and spend time in class. However, this school offers much more freedom than the real one because players can do whatever they want and no one can punish them for breaking the rules. In this school, students can shout out phrases from popular memes, but they need to pay Points for this. Fortunately, they can be obtained by entering codes that users will find in this article.

item.title: Steam is Now Telling Players to Play With a Controller for Certain Games
item.dc:creator: Trumann Tu
item.description: Steam will now inform gamers about certain games on the client that require an external controller to get the best gameplay experience.
item.content:encoded: The latest update to Valve's Steam client now includes a message before starting a game, helpfully informing a player that they will require a controller for the best gameplay experience. The Steam client is still one of the most popular PC gaming storefronts and platforms for gamers to use. Several AAA and indie titles are published on Steam, which all feature different control methods. Steam's controller support has been pretty extensive, especially with how advanced the Steam Input can be in reading several different controllers.

item.title: Super Mario RPG: All Hidden Treasures in the Mushroom Kingdom Region
item.dc:creator: Greysun Morales
item.description: Super Mario RPG has a bunch of secret treasures that can't be seen with the human eye; here's how to find them all in the Mushroom Kingdom.
item.content:encoded: In Super Mario RPG, players will be able to jump using the B button while exploring the overworld to discover hidden treasure chests that cannot be seen with the naked eye. These chests are home to some useful items for Mario and the gang during battle, such as Special Flowers and Frog Coins. It'll be pretty hard to find these things normally, but thankfully, there's an item called the Signal Ring that players can get that will alert them of nearby hidden chests. This guide will go over how to get the Signal Ring in Super Mario RPG and where to find all the hidden chests in the Mushroom Kingdom region.

item.title: Pokemon: Best Type Combinations, Ranked
item.dc:creator: Rhenn Taguiam
item.description: Pokemon features a lot of interesting type combinations. Here's a look at some of the absolute best, ranked.
item.content:encoded: Pokemon fans who want to go competitive will want to maximize the combat potential of their Pokemon roster. Those who want to become the next Champion in Nintendo's hit franchise have got to give their A-Game - synergy and strategy play a huge role in any hopeful Champion's arsenal. However, most Pokémon experts rely on Type synergies to maximize the presence of their Pokémon in a match.

item.title: Roblox: Horse Race Simulator Codes
item.dc:creator: Artur Novichenko
item.description: In this guide, Roblox players can find all the active Horse Race Simulator codes.
item.content:encoded: As the name suggests, in Roblox: Horse Race Simulator fans have the opportunity to participate in horse racing. The gameplay is similar to dozens of other experiences, in which players need to train and participate in races to buy the best horses and pets to become faster. Over time, fans will run to the finish line in a few seconds, but for that, they will need a little game currency at the beginning, which can be easily obtained by entering several Horse Race Simulator codes.

item.title: Most Powerful Spider-Man Gadgets In The Comics
item.dc:creator: Kath Leroy
item.description: In the Marvel Comics, Spider-Man knows that a few extra gadgets are key to using his powers to their full potential.
item.content:encoded: The fewer powers a superhero has in their comics, the more likely they are to rely on various gadgets and tools in order to fight crime. That is especially true if they have no powers at all (Ant-Man) or if they are rich (Iron Man). Spider-Man, however, is one of the exceptions to the rule.

item.title: One Piece: Things That Prove Marines Are Evil
item.dc:creator: Suzail Ahmad
item.description: The Marines have done many questionable things in One Piece.
item.content:encoded: The Marines are considered just and kind by the majority of the people; after all, they claim to be the upholders of law and order. But the truth is that the organization is riddled with corrupt and immoral individuals who do not care about the welfare of people.

item.title: Call of Duty: MW3 Releases Huge New Update With Changes for Multiplayer, Zombies, and More
item.dc:creator: Raul Landaverde
item.description: A major new update for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 brings several changes to multiplayer, Zombies, and certain gameplay mechanics.
item.content:encoded: Activision and Sledgehammer Games released a major new update for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 featuring changes for multiplayer, Zombies, and overall gameplay mechanics. Many fan-requested changes were made in this particular Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 update, including a decreased Tac Sprint delay after sliding.

item.title: The Sims: Bella Goth's Disappearance Explained
item.dc:creator: Ramon Hara
item.description: Bella Goth appears to be an ordinary wife and mother, but her curious disappearance in The Sims franchise continues to puzzle and mesmerize fans.
item.content:encoded: It is no secret that The Sims has dominated the life simulation video game genre since its release in 2000. While others attempted to replicate The Sims's success, it remains the most popular life sim franchise with four main games, countless expansion packs, and many spin-off titles. Of course, despite being released over two decades ago, the feature that made The Sims famous is its open sandbox-style gameplay, allowing players to be whoever and whatever they want and create their own stories.

item.title: Best Precursors In Stellaris
item.dc:creator: Evan Arnoldi Sebayang
item.description: Although it can often be difficult, solving a precursor's mystery in Stellaris can lead to some neat benefits.
item.content:encoded: Every player of Stellaris will always find that there is a precursor empire that predates their civilization by millennia in every game, although researching and solving each precursor's mystery might be a challenge due to both time and location constraints. Moreover, completing a precursor's event chain can be quite challenging.

item.title: Breaking Bad: Gray Matter Technologies, Explained
item.dc:creator: Matthew Kelly
item.description: Before Walter White was Heisenberg, he helped start Gray Matters Technologies with his college classmate Elliot Schwartz.
item.content:encoded: It's no secret Walter White from Breaking Bad is an extremely intelligent person -- scientist, at that. But no one in their right mind would decide to start cooking crystal meth just for the thrill of it. A lot went into the life-altering decision made by the man who would eventually become Heisenberg.

item.title: Two Alan Wake Side Characters Have a Clear Direction After AW2
item.dc:creator: J. Scott Thurlow
item.description: Alan Wake 2 leaves a number of avenues open for its side characters, and these two have an obvious path forward.
item.content:encoded: This article contains major spoilers for Alan Wake 2Remedy Entertainment's Alan Wake 2 has achieved major success after a 13-year-long gap between the 2010 original cult classic. Switching to the survival-horror genre along with the introduction of a new protagonist, Agent Saga Anderson, next-gen visuals, and the continuation of its mind-bending story, Alan Wake 2 impressed on many fronts. Indeed, despite its late release window, Alan Wake 2 has recently been nominated for Game of The Year in The Game Awards 2023.

item.title: World of Warcraft: Shadowlands Abilities Getting a Makeover in Patch 10.2.5
item.dc:creator: Eric Law
item.description: In Patch 10.2.5, Seeds of Renewal, World of Warcraft is making some big changes to abilities players first saw during the Shadowlands expansion.
item.content:encoded: World of Warcraft is finally changing the animations for certain Shadowlands Covenant abilities that have since been baked into many class Talent Trees. This cosmetic change will come as a part of World of Warcraft Patch 10.2.5, Seeds of Renewal.

item.title: Best MW3 Rival-9 Loadout and Setup
item.dc:creator: Felister Moraa
item.description: Here’s the best Rival-9 loadout to dominate close encounters in COD: Modern Warfare 3.
item.content:encoded: Submachine guns are arsenal weapons in Modern Warfare 3, boasting excellent accuracy, fast time-to-kill, and manageable recoil control. Rival-9 is among the best SMGs in Modern Warfare 3, and it shines in close-quarters combat thanks to its fast TTK. It's perfect for run-and-gun engagements and players who love aggressive playstyles.

item.title: How Star Wars Galaxies: Legends' Senate System Changes the Game
item.dc:creator: Joey Brown
item.description: Game Rant chats with Star Wars Galaxies: Legends project administrator Lokee about how the player senate influences developer decisions.
item.content:encoded: One of the most unique aspects of Star Wars Galaxies was its player Senate system which opened up a more direct line of communication between players and developers. These Star Wars-styled Senators were elected by players to represent their interests in the game to the developers; for example, a senator might run on the platform that they intend to bring forth proposals to revamp a particular ship or rework a game mechanic.

item.title: Nintendo is Offering a Cool Throwback Super Mario RPG Reward
item.dc:creator: Trumann Tu
item.description: To tie in with the Super Mario RPG remake's release on Nintendo Switch, fans can get a retro reward based on the original SNES game.
item.content:encoded: Players can redeem Platinum Points through the My Nintendo rewards program to get a retro-looking reverse box art for physical copies of the Super Mario RPG remake on Nintendo Switch. Fans were greatly anticipating the release of Super Mario RPG after its surprise announcement at the June 2023 Nintendo Direct. Now that the game is out, it has been praised by fans and critics for being a faithful remake while making a number of quality-of-life tweaks and adding new content. As such, the Super Mario RPG remake has become one of the highest reviewed games of 2023.

item.title: Alan Wake 2 Releases Update 12
item.dc:creator: Dalton Cooper
item.description: Remedy Entertainment releases update 12 for Alan Wake 2, the studio's critically-acclaimed survival-horror game.
item.content:encoded: Remedy Entertainment's Alan Wake 2 earned critical acclaim at the time of its release, but it still has some technical issues that the developers have been fixing with post-launch updates, the latest of which is available to download right now. While the game earned mostly positive reviews, Alan Wake 2 has been criticized for some technical shortcomings.

item.title: Mods That Turn Skyrim Into A Survival Game
item.dc:creator: Anastasia Maillot
item.description: While Skyrim is one of the best open-world games ever, its survival aspects can be too easy. These cool mods make things like disease more realistic.
item.content:encoded: Even without any mods or add-ons, The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim is still a pretty engaging game. There's such a large map to see and so many different quests to finish that players who plan on finishing the game vanilla-style aren't likely to get bored any time soon. For those wanting to change things up and introduce challenges into the game, turning Skyrim into a survival experience might just be the solution. Countless mods out there change the gameplay in a way that makes it essential for players to focus on details like hunger, diseases, and even temperature changes.

item.title: The Resident Evil Franchise Has One Unexplored Genre That's a Perfect Fit for a Spin-Off
item.dc:creator: Matt Karoglou
item.description: Resident Evil spin-offs typically don't stray far from the third-person shooter motif, but there's one unlikely genre that's a perfect fit.
item.content:encoded: In the nearly 30 years of history across the entire Resident Evil franchise, most of the series' spin-offs tend to play it safe when it comes to genres. It makes sense that most of the non-mainline games in the series would lean more heavily into the third-person shooter aspects of Resident Evil's gameplay and afford players less restriction than the resource management and puzzle solving of the original trilogy, but the series' continual ventures into action game territory has made most of the more recent spin-offs feel somewhat redundant. It's time for a new kind of Resident Evil spin-off that leans more heavily into the careful encounter design of the original game via the turn-based tactics genre.

item.title: Games That Subvert Expectations In Their Intro Boss Fights
item.dc:creator: Nyah Payne
item.description: Some games establish that they will be subverting expectations from the very first boss fight. Here are some of the best examples.
item.content:encoded: From the moment players first pick up a game, they will start to get a feel for it and what they can expect down the line. Arguably one of the earliest moments in a game that can give players a good idea of what to expect throughout is that very first boss encounter.

item.title: Humble Choice Games for November 2023 Explained
item.dc:creator: Max Borman
item.description: A new month has finally arrived, which means it is time for a new bundle of games for subscribers to claim from Humble Bundle's Humble Choice service.
item.content:encoded: A new month has finally arrived, which means Humble Bundle is back with another exciting bundle of games through its Humble Choice subscription service. For $11.99, subscribers are able to add different titles to their Steam libraries until the end of the month - specifically, a total of eight games. Not only do fans get to spend hours playing these games, but 5% of each subscription also goes to Child's Play Charity, which tries to improve the lives of children and teen patients through therapeutic games and technology.

item.title: December 8 is Going to Be a Sad Day for Battlefield Fans
item.dc:creator: Dalton Cooper
item.description: Friday, December 8 is shaping up to be a particularly sad day for fans of EA and DICE's popular Battlefield franchise.
item.content:encoded: Unfortunately for fans of the Battlefield franchise, the online multiplayer servers for Battlefield 1943, Battlefield: Bad Company, and Battlefield: Bad Company 2 are all being shut down on Friday, December 8. The Battlefield series has had it rough in recent years, especially after the disastrous launch of Battlefield 2042, but there once was a time when the first-person shooter franchise was one of the most popular series on EA's roster.

item.title: Why Pokemon Gen 5 Remakes Have to Release Before the Switch 2
item.dc:creator: Drew Swanson
item.description: The next games in the Pokemon series are rumored to be Pokemon Black and White remakes, but they need to be released before Nintendo's next console.
item.content:encoded: As the release of The Indigo Disk DLC for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet approaches, many players are starting to speculate on what will be next for the series. The common theory at the moment based on leaks and rumors is that the next mainline Pokemon games will return to the Unova Region in some form, either via a Pokemon Legends Unova game or Pokemon Black and White remakes. However, as the Switch winds down its life as a console and Nintendo's next system becomes the new target for developers, these Gen 5 Pokemon remakes must be released before the new console does, for one major reason.

item.title: Improvements Needed In Modern Warfare 3 Zombies
item.dc:creator: Isaiah Williams
item.description: Modern Warfare Zombies has done plenty to provide a great new experience, but there is more to be desired.
item.content:encoded: Call of Duty Modern Warfare 3 has opened up to mixed reception levels, stemming from its lackluster campaign in the eyes of fans. Many feel that the story's ending on this occasion was anti-climactic, concluding at a breakneck speed with a particular character's death. Besides this, the Multiplayer and Zombies counterparts of Modern Warfare 3 have already provided a much better experience than its predecessor.

item.title: Death Note: The Rise & Fall Of Light Yagami
item.dc:creator: Jehan Fernando
item.description: Light's journey from a regular high school student to God and finally, his demise.
item.content:encoded: The gripping story of Death Note has become a cult classic in the world of anime and manga and has taken the world by storm since its release, making it one of the most talked about series around. The story follows the main character of the series, Light Yagami, a high school student who comes across the Death Note and becomes intoxicated with the power to dictate life and death and takes up a secret alias known as Kira.

item.title: This is a First-Time Deal on This Xbox Series S Bundle on Amazon
item.dc:creator: Matti Robinson
item.description: Microsoft Xbox Series S Gilded Hunters Bundle is currently available at a record-setting discounted price of $249.99 on Amazon.
item.content:encoded: Amazon is currently offering the Microsoft Xbox Series S Gilded Hunters Bundle at a reduced price of $249.99 during the Black Friday sale. This is a seemingly small 17% discount from its regular price of $299.99 but is, in fact, the best deal on this specific bundle ever on Amazon. This deal saves buyers $50 on the usual price, which is a good deal even for just the console. However, this bundle comes also with exclusive in-game cosmetics and virtual currency for popular games like Fortnite, Rocket League, and Fall Guys.

item.title: Spider-Man 2 Miles Morales Star Learned Sign Language for the Role
item.dc:creator: Trumann Tu
item.description: The voice and mocap actor for Miles Morales in Marvel's Spider-Man 2 reveals he learned sign language for the character's role.
item.content:encoded: The voice and motion capture actor for Miles Morales in Marvel's Spider-Man 2, Nadji Jeter, learned American Sign Language in order to help develop his character's role for the game. Insomniac's Spider-Man 2 continues the adventures of both Peter Parker and Miles Morales as they face off against the threats of Kraven the Hunter and Venom. Spider-Man 2 builds on some of the relationships established in previous games, like the one between Miles Morales and artist Hailey Cooper.

item.title: Why the Epic Games Store Free Game For November 23 is Perfect For Budding Space Explorers
item.dc:creator: Zackari Greif
item.description: The Epic Games Store free game for November 23 invites players to explore an iconic planet in detail, and it may be a great way for fans to kill time.
item.content:encoded: The specific rate at which the Epic Games Store gives out its free games is a strange mix of predictable yet unreliable. It's almost a lottery whether the upcoming week on the Epic Games Store will offer one game or two, and sometimes, it may change at the very last minute. The last few selections have made this fact about the promotion very apparent, and the week of November 23 is looking to be one of the times when only one game will be offered. Still, as players can get these games at no extra cost, it remains a great offer.

item.title: EA Game Suddenly Delisted With No Prior Announcement
item.dc:creator: Dalton Cooper
item.description: EA suddenly removes one of its games from all digital storefronts with no prior announcement about its removal.
item.content:encoded: EA has suddenly removed its online multiplayer hero shooter game Rocket Arena with no prior announcement. Rocket Arena was first released in 2020, developed by Final Strike Games and published by EA. Rocket Arena reviews were somewhat mixed but mostly positive at the time of the game's release, with many praising the core gameplay and the unique spin it brought to hero shooters.

item.title: Every Feature that Honkai: Star Rail Has and Genshin Impact Needs
item.dc:creator: Jackie Brumley
item.description: HoYoverse’s sci-fi adventure game, Honkai: Star Rail, has several player quality of life features that Genshin Impact could also make use of.
item.content:encoded: Genshin Impact and Honkai: Star Rail are both games made by the same developer, HoYoverse. While Genshin Impact has been out for roughly three years, Honkai: Star Rail has only been out for roughly eight months. Although they have a lot of things in common, like both being gacha games, there are some player quality of life improvements that are present in Star Rail that Genshin lacks. These improvements range in use from new players to those at a high Trailblazer level. If brought to Genshin in some way, shape or form, it would be a boon to all players, regardless of where they're at in the story.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy Easter Eggs
item.dc:creator: Joe Grantham
item.description: Hogwarts Legacy holds several secret nods to the Harry Potter books and movies, which only longtime fans will be able to catch.
item.content:encoded: For a game like Hogwarts Legacy, which was built upon the back of an entire book and movie series with all sorts of spinoffs, there is naturally a vast array of easter eggs waiting for players to discover. Considering how many pages the Harry Potter books span, there are plenty of details people may not remember without reading the whole series multiple times.

item.title: What to Expect From Genshin Impact's Version 4.3 Banners
item.dc:creator: Blade Moore
item.description: Genshin Impact's upcoming 4.3 banners have a lot of excitement packed in them for players new and old alike, with some interesting reruns.
item.content:encoded: One of Genshin Impact players' favorite new events for each patch is the banners as they always cause a stir of excitement in the community. Content creators will splurge on new banners or wish on behalf of their viewers--overall, it is always an exciting time. And with 4.3 on the rise, people are waiting in eager anticipation to see Genshin Impact creators wish and be able to wish for themselves.

item.title: Dragon Ball: Majin Buu's Biggest Weaknesses
item.dc:creator: Joseph Heindl
item.description: Dragon Ball's bubble gum baddie may seem unbeatable, but Buu has a few flaws that clever fighters can exploit.
item.content:encoded: For the longest time, Majin Buu seemed like the most insurmountable foe in Dragon Ball. Not only does he have immense power, but he sports an unparalleled regenerative ability. These strengths make him extremely tough to kill or even damage. Despite the daunting odds, though, his armor has a few weak links.

item.title: Bloodborne is Proof That a FromSoftware Roguelike Could Work
item.dc:creator: Liam Ferguson
item.description: Many parts of Bloodborne are distinct and impressive, and even its most controversial element holds an idea for a whole new kind of FromSoftware game.
item.content:encoded: To this day, Bloodborne is still considered one of FromSoftware’s finest works. Why that is depends on the player asked, with reasons ranging from its fast-paced and satisfying combat to its unbroken gothic horror presentation, and everything in between. Even as Elden Ring approaches its DLC and new FromSoftware titles are rumored to be in development, fans are still adamant that Bloodborne needs an updated re-release to iron out technical issues and get it on modern platforms.

item.title: Todd Howard Reveals How Many Bethesda Employees Are Still Working on Starfield
item.dc:creator: Christian Miller
item.description: In a recent video, Todd Howard reveals how many developers are still assigned to Starfield, as well as how this may affect The Elder Scrolls 6.
item.content:encoded: While The Elder Scrolls 6 entered the development stage at Bethesda, Todd Howard reveals that the majority of the studio is still working on Starfield. The latest Bethesda title broke several major milestones, garnering plenty of interest at launch on both PC and Xbox, but support for the game fizzled out in the following weeks, as now even Skyrim has more players than Starfield on Steam.

item.title: Sonic Unleashed Still Remains a Shining Example of the Franchise 15 Years Later
item.dc:creator: Zackari Greif
item.description: Sonic Unleashed is an important game to many fans of the franchise after 15 years for good reason as many other titles don't do what it did prior.
item.content:encoded: No matter how much time has passed, Sonic Unleashed still remains as many fans' favorite game starring the blue blur for many reasons. While it was rather mixed in terms of reception when the game launched, players typically walk away from the game with something to remember about it. These aspects typically end up being things that only Sonic Unleashed has managed to do before or since, even after fifteen years.

item.title: Breathtaking Skyrim Video Shows Lore-Accurate Winterhold in Unreal Engine 5
item.dc:creator: Dalton Cooper
item.description: An Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim fan recreates the game's snowy town of Winterhold in Unreal Engine 5 at a scale accurate to the game's lore.
item.content:encoded: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim fan Leo Torres has created a lore-accurate version of Winterhold using Unreal Engine 5. One of the reasons why Skyrim is still so popular to this day is because of its massive, engrossing open world, filled with interesting locations and cities for players to visit and explore. But in order to create a more streamlined and convenient gaming experience, Skyrim's cities aren't their true scale in the game.

item.title: LOTR: Who is Gimli's Father?
item.dc:creator: Vrushali Padia
item.description: Gimli’s father, Gloin plays a crucial role in shaping the LOTR universe.
item.content:encoded: Gimli, son of Gloin, is one of the most memorable dwarven characters from J.R.R. Tolkien's beloved fantasy works The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit. As a member of the legendary Fellowship of the Ring, Gimli played a pivotal role in the quest to destroy the One Ring and defeat Sauron. However, not much is said about Gimli's background and family within the main text of the stories in LOTR.

item.title: Combat in Horizon 3 Could Use One Feature From God of War
item.dc:creator: Elena Baker
item.description: Horizon Forbidden West already upgraded the series' combat significantly, but a God of War feature could make combat all the more exciting.
item.content:encoded: In Horizon Forbidden West, Aloy's journey unfolds as a testament to the transformative power of friendship and the acceptance of help from others. Initially an outcast, she navigated a harsh world alone, honing her skills and courage in the process. However, when faced with the formidable Zeniths, a new level of threat emerged, necessitating a collaborative effort. Characters like Varl, Beta, Erend, Zo, Kotallo, Alva, and Sylens played crucial roles in supporting Aloy to overcome this challenge. These companions worked together at the Forbidden West base and stuck together despite the challenges. This cooperative dynamic not only showcases the strength of camaraderie but also sets the stage for a feature reminiscent of God of War in the upcoming Horizon installment.

item.title: Minecraft 1.21 Wolf Armor Won't Be Complete Without One Feature
item.dc:creator: Luci S
item.description: Since the armadillo has been chosen as the winner of the 2023 Minecraft Mob Vote, future wolf armor should incorporate one very important feature.
item.content:encoded: The annual Minecraft Mob Vote has attracted quite a bit of attention since its inauguration in 2017. With millions of players registering to vote each year, the Minecraft Mob Vote is one of the most engaging community events dedicated to the game. Of course, the controversy surrounding the event may have led to a decrease in overall voters when compared to previous years.

item.title: Best Mass Effect Romances
item.dc:creator: Lucy Melocco
item.description: The Mass Effect series is filled with romance options. Here's a look at some of the absolute best, ranked.
item.content:encoded: Romance is one of the most popular aspects of the Mass Effect franchise, and the love interests in its lineup are an impressive bunch. These characters are compelling, some to the point of controversy, and getting to know them more intimately can reveal a whole new dimension to the games they feature in. The best romances in the franchise aren’t always the most fleshed-out ones, but they continue to be popular after players revisited the trilogy through Mass Effect: Legendary Edition. From the Mass Effect: Andromeda lineup, the best romances may only have one game to introduce them, but they carry on the tradition of Mass Effect romances that make this franchise worth playing.

item.title: I’m in Love With the Villainess Ventures Into Another Controversial Trope
item.dc:creator: Ahmed Rehan Nasir
item.description: I’m in Love With the Villainess takes a unique approach to a played-out anime trope.
item.content:encoded: Warning: The following contains spoilers for I’m in Love With the Villainess, Episode 7, "What Makes or Breaks a School Fair Is the Cross-Dressing Café," now streaming on Crunchyroll.

item.title: Stellaris: Leviathans With Best Rewards, Ranked
item.dc:creator: Evan Arnoldi Sebayang
item.description: The following leviathans provide tremendous rewards in Paradox's Stellaris.
item.content:encoded: Aside from other sentient empires that may have been hostile or peaceful, players can also encounter many wonders of the galaxy while playing Stellaris, ranging from anomalies that need to be resolved to archaeological sites that will reveal how past empires thrived before the player established their empire.

item.title: Final Fantasy 7: Ever Crisis Confirms Chapter 4 Release Date and Content
item.dc:creator: Romeo Moran
item.description: Final Fantasy 7: Ever Crisis drops a surprise new trailer for its next chapter, which explores points the Remake series hasn't gotten to yet.
item.content:encoded: Square Enix has announced the next chapter of Final Fantasy 7: Ever Crisis. Chapter four of the game will focus on pivotal points of Cloud's backstory with antagonist Sephiroth.

item.title: 1 Year Later, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Are The Most Revolutionary Mainline Games in the Series
item.dc:creator: Andrea Trama
item.description: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet are not perfect games, but one year after their launch, they are one of the best and most unique experiences in the series.
item.content:encoded: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet's reception on launch was not the best given the limitations imposed by performance issues, glitches, and weird animations, giving many players the impression that Gen 9 was far from perfect - but could have been much better with more time in the oven. Still, Gen 9 games are perhaps the single most influential entry in the mainline series by a huge margin, with spin-off titles like Pokemon Legends: Arceus spicing up the competition for the overall franchise. The main reason for this is that Pokemon Scarlet and Violet break multiple traditions, which is a great thing when it comes to a general sense of novelty and how much the games actually stand out compared to their predecessors.

item.title: Taking StarCraft Away from the RTS Genre May be a Mistake
item.dc:creator: Max Borman
item.description: Blizzard has hinted that StarCraft may come back as something new, but that change could be a massive mistake for the franchise if not handled well.
item.content:encoded: Blizzard hasn't done much with the StarCraft franchise since 2017, but that may be changing soon. While nothing has been officially announced yet, Blizzard president Mike Ybarra has suggested that the series could come back now that the studio is under Microsoft. However, that next StarCraft game may not actually be an RTS, and that change could be a massive mistake.

item.title: This Black Friday Deal Is the Best Amazon Price Ever for the 4070 Ti GPU
item.dc:creator: Matti Robinson
item.description: Those looking for a GPU bargain should take a look at this first-ever sub-$900 ASUS ROG Strix GeForce RTX 4070 Ti OC deal.
item.content:encoded: Amazon currently offers the Asus ROG Strix NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Ti OC Edition graphics card at a superb price of $899.99. While it is only a 14% discount, it is the best deal one is going to find on this card. This is the first time the GPU has dropped under $900, so those looking for top-tier performance on their PCs, should take note of the deal. The discount is going to save $150 on the regular listing price of the card, which is $1049.99.

item.title: Best Defensive Items In Risk Of Rain Returns
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Rodriguez
item.description: Players can't go wrong with the following defensive items in Risk of Rain Returns.
item.content:encoded: When loading up on items in Risk of Rain Returns, getting defensive items is just as important as purchasing offensive ones. Having defensive items allows players to last longer against more hard-hitting foes and bosses on top of swarming hordes that are all chomping at the bit to take out the Survivors.

item.title: Vinland Saga: Thorkell's Warrior Code, Explained
item.dc:creator: Shawn Wilken
item.description: Brash, loud, and proud, Thorkell represents the Viking who loves to engage in battle and spill the blood of his enemies, but he also keeps a code.
item.content:encoded: Perhaps one of the most unpredictable characters in the series, Thorkell is one of the loudest and proudest characters, contributing to what makes Vinland Saga fun to watch. Introduced in Episode 1, "Somewhere Not Here," Thorkell is a commander of the Jomsviking and stands side-by-side with Thors Snorresson, the Troll of Jom. Though he is second in pure power and brutality, those who oppose him would be mistaken for believing they'd survive. Wielding an axe, Thorkell can slice many men in half, all while doing it with a smile on his face.

item.title: One New 2D Soulsvania May Be the Closest Thing to a Bloodborne 2
item.dc:creator: Matt Karoglou
item.description: FromSoftware may be continuing to let the Bloodborne IP languish, but that hasn't stopped other developers from delivering their own takes.
item.content:encoded: Plenty of Soulslike fans still hold out hope that developer FromSoftware will one day either remaster Bloodborne for PC and modern consoles or provide players with a genuine sequel. Meanwhile, other studios have decided to boldly step in and deliver their own takes on a spiritual successor or follow-up. This year alone has already seen the release of two games with more than their fair share of obvious Bloodborne inspiration, and both titles happen to bring FromSoftware's PS4-exclusive to mind in different ways. Lies of P may have players covered as far as a 3D Bloodborne-like, but it's Kumi Souls' The Last Faith that does an impressive job of imagining Bloodborne as a 2D Soulsvania.

item.title: Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom Player Discovers Recall Trick To Make Powerful Explosions
item.dc:creator: Berat Özkan
item.category: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
item.description: A Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom player discovers that they can use Recall to create powerful explosions and kill hordes of enemies.
item.content:encoded: One The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom player has discovered that they can use the Recall ability on a Zonai cannon to detonate many bomb flowers and create a powerful explosion. Recall is one of Link's abilities that changes the core gameplay in Tears of the Kingdom drastically, allowing players to deconstruct vehicles and reverse time for almost all objects lying around Hyrule. It's an enhanced version of Breath of the Wild's Stasis ability.

item.title: New Wonder Woman Game Update is Good News for Fans
item.dc:creator: Dalton Cooper
item.description: A new update on the upcoming Wonder Woman video game from Monolith Productions is good news for fans of the comic book hero.
item.content:encoded: Despite a job listing hinting at the contrary, it seems that the upcoming Wonder Woman video game from Monolith Productions will not be a live service game after all. Wonder Woman was first announced at The Game Awards 2021, and there hasn't been much in the way of substantial updates on the project since then. Monolith hasn't put out a game since 2017's Middle-earth: Shadow of War, and so many fans are understandably anxious to see more of its Wonder Woman project.

item.title: 2024 Video Game Release Date Calendar
item.dc:creator: Greysun Morales
item.description: Check out this guide to find out the release dates for every major video game coming out in 2024.
item.content:encoded: While it's still 2023, there are already plenty of video games to look forward to that are planned to come out in 2024. For example, Nintendo is releasing a brand-new Princess Peach game; Ubisoft is making a 2D Prince of Persia game that shares a lot of similarities with Metroid Dread; the next part of the acclaimed Final Fantasy 7 remake is coming out; Star Wars is getting another major release; and that just scratches the surface. We should expect many more 2024 video game release dates as more presentations happen, like The Game Awards later this year, the next Nintendo Direct, and all the other online streams.

item.title: Fighting Games That Launched In 2023 & (Games That Have Been Delayed)
item.dc:creator: David Heath
item.description: 2023 was an exciting year for fighting games, even if some titles did end up receiving a delay.
item.content:encoded: Since the resurgence of the fighting game genre, it's seen plenty of high points. Tekken went from feeling stagnant to gaining a new lease on life in Tekken 7. Mortal Kombat got bloodier than ever before its developers Netherrealm Studios put the claret away to give DC a Marvel contender with the Injustice games.

item.title: The Best Psychedelic Anime
item.dc:creator: Sarah Prado
item.description: These anime have colorful visuals and mind-bending themes that help them stand out.
item.content:encoded: Anime is full of unique themes and characters that help make them stand out and be different from one another. But there are some shows out there that are unique and even downright strange for a variety of reasons. Some of them have dark themes that play tricks on the mind and some have such wacky themes that they seem like something out of a children’s cartoon show.

item.title: One Piece: Did Kuma Become A Cyborg To Save Bonney?
item.dc:creator: Jerry Elengical
item.description: Could the truth behind Kuma's tragedy be related to the girl he raised as his own child?
item.content:encoded: The flashback to Bartholomew Kuma's past has been one of the most intriguing segments of the Egghead Arc in One Piece, with regard to the many longstanding questions that have been answered about his character. In a story arc as crammed with action, excitement, and earth-shattering revelations, this is high praise to confer upon a particular segment, but few would disagree about how it is deserving of such appreciation.
